name: Node Problem
description:
Enjoy how cool randomess can look! Less of a game and more of a digital toy; something you play with rather than play. You can control how the nodes and lines spawn, look and move, and your mouse itself is a node.

Controls:

Hold up/down and R/G/B: Change the colour of the nodes and lines, shown in the top right

Hold up/down and S: Change the spawn speed of new nodes

Hold up/down and D: Set how the lines become stronger as nodes are closer

Hold up/down and N: Change the number of nodes
